mapper.select: SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.SELLER_CODE , A.BUYER_CODE , A.POST_CAT_CODE , A.AUTH_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.LIKE_COUNT , A.POST_TIME , A.SOLD_YN , A.REPORT_COUNT , A.BLIND_YN , A.ITEM_PRICE , A.POST_VIEW FROM POST A ORDER BY A.POST_CODE DESC

SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.SELLER_CODE , A.BUYER_CODE , A.POST_CAT_CODE , A.AUTH_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.LIKE_COUNT , A.POST_TIME , A.SOLD_YN , A.REPORT_COUNT , A.BLIND_YN , A.ITEM_PRICE , A.POST_VIEW FROM POST A
JOIN "USER" B ON (A.SELLER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) WHERE B.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
WHERE A.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
WHERE A.POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
ORDER BY A.POST_CODE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE POST A SET A.BLIND_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.POST_CODE = #{code}
